DOC.brief_summary: The study nest case-control study purpose describe status key nutrient ( eg.folic acid vitamin ) supplementation among pregnant woman Shanghai , find association level serum key nutrient peri-conceptional period incidence congenital heart defect ( CHD ) newborn , provide good preconception care .
DOC.brief_title: Peri-conception Key Nutritional Factors Congenital Heart Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Congenital heart defect ( CHD ) among common major congenital anomaly incidence 8-12/1,000 live birth worldwide . The mechanism CHD still unclear . Many study indicate level key nutrient ( eg.folic acid vitamin ) peri-conceptional period might affect incidence CHD , evidence limit . The study aim explore association serum key nutrient peri-conceptional period incidence CHD newborn . All couple attend pre-pregnancy physical examination 11 district ( Minhang District , Huangpu District , Xuhui District , Changning District , Jingan District , Putuo District , Yangpu District , Jiading District , Pudong Districtï¼ŒSongjiang District , Qingpu District ) Shanghai March 2016 , recruit blood sample questionnaires supplementation key nutrient collect . During gestation , venous blood pregnant woman three trimester take . Besides , questionnaires supplementation key nutrient first antenatal visit also obtain . The level serum folic acid , vitamin A vitamin B12 preconception gestation measure . Finally , investigator identifies whose newborn develop CHD follow-up case . Then , investigator select four control case rest cohort match constitutional determinant CHD age sex . Participants identify national identification number follow . The level serum key nutrient compare case control . Univariate multivariate association analyse perform identify risk factor CHD use multivariate logistic regression model .
DOC.criteria: attend prepregnancy physical examination 11 district Shanghai plan delivery Shanghai
